meanings.sent1: The table was shaky and wobbled when touched.
meanings.sent2: She felt uneasy walking on the shaky bridge.
meanings.sent3: The shaky chair made funny noises whenever someone sat on it.
meanings.sent4: His shaky confidence showed in his hesitant speech.
meanings.sent5: The shaky ground beneath them made every step uncertain.

meanings.sent5: The shaky economy caused widespread concern among the citizens.
